name: Laser Turret Duel
description:
Take turns firing bullets at each other while the other blocks the incoming fire. Every round, ammo and the rate of fire will increase. Whoever takes the most damage at the end of the round loses.

In its current state, the game is only its core mechanics. I plan to improve the visuals, add options to tweak gameplay and add online multiplayer in the future.

Player 1's Controls:  Block/Fire Left/Forward/Right with the Arrow Keys
Player 2's Controls:  Block/Fire Left/Forward/Right with WASD
